title: Espinosa
content:
![Espinosa](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818233637im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/26019.gif)   
   
This is Espinosa, a revival designed by Crist
author: rs_donsata

comments.content:
I like this, but I wonder if this isn't too 'quirky' (fussy?) and loose for body text? And the ascenders could be a little longer too. Anyway, the decorative dingbats are nice. The face looks also darker than usual, which is good too.   
   
Thanks for sharing this with us, Hector.
I was able to see recently some examples of the font in text settings and also thinks it
